creator.description:
(STILL UNDER CONSTRUCTION)

Label service that differentiates from authentic NHL accounts and those who are impersonating on what would otherwise be a teams handle. Also handles verification of NHL staff and team employees.

Run by @bdogz.xyz

locales.description: A NHL team account verified by either their domain or by the NHL team themselves.
locales.name: Authentic NHL Team

locales.description: Account that is confirmed to not be owned by the NHL team it claims to be representing and is otherwise impersonating.
locales.name: Fake Account (NHL Team)

locales.description: An NHL (or NHL team) official verified by either their domain or by the NHL / NHL team themselves.
locales.name: Authentic NHL Official

locales.description: Account that is confirmed to not be owned by the official it claims to be representing and is otherwise impersonating.
locales.name: Fake Account (NHL Official)

locales.description: Account that is reposting posts from Twitter / X via the sportsbots Mastodon instance.
locales.name: Account Mirror (NHL Team)

locales.description: Account that is reposting posts from Twitter / X via the sportsbots Mastodon instance.
locales.name: Account Mirror (NHL Official)

locales.description: A NHL account that has unknown authenticity and needs further investigation.
locales.name: Unknown Authenticity
